verbs.description: [ARG0: The secretary - general] [ARGM-ADV: also] [V: said] [ARG1: he had thanked President Donald Trump for securing bigger NATO budgets] .
The secretary - general also said he [V: had] thanked President Donald Trump for securing bigger NATO budgets .
The secretary - general also said [ARG0: he] had [V: thanked] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARG2: for securing bigger NATO budgets] .
The secretary - general also said he had thanked [ARG0: President Donald Trump] for [V: securing] [ARG1: bigger NATO budgets] .
